title: Change consensus params
description: The Proposal change some consensus params. In details: 1. consensus_params.block.max_bytes from 200000 to 20971520, 2. consensus_params.block.max_gas from 2000000 to 200000000, 3. consensus_params.block_time_iota_ms from 1000 to 1000, 4. consensus_params.evidence.max_age_num_blocks from 100000 to 204670, 5. consensus_params.evidence.max_age_duration from 172800000000000 to 1209600000000000, 6. consensus_params.evidence.max_bytes from nil to 1048576
